params.name: filePath
params.description: Path to the file where it needs to be created, all directories should be present

params.name: headers
params.description: Separate the headers with new line, or pass an array of strings(could be JSON). CSV file will have this amount of columns.

params.name: data
params.description: Separate the values with new line(only one row), or pass nested array of strings(could be JSON), where each array represents a row.
